mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", creater.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.f_erpid AS "erpId", a.f_type AS "type", a.f_billno AS "billNo", a.f_synstatus AS "synStatus", a.f_syntime AS "synTime", a.f_custid AS "custId", a.f_emplid AS "emplId", a.f_currencyid AS "currencyId", a.f_needtime AS "needTime", a.f_status AS "status", a.f_cancellation AS "cancellation", a.f_checkerid AS "checkerId", a.f_checktime AS "checkTime", a.f_checkstatus AS "checkStatus", a.f_amount AS "amount", a.f_followerid AS "followerId", emp.name AS "empName", checker.name AS "checkerName", dept.name AS "deptName", cus.f_name AS "cusName", follower.name AS "followerName", date_format(a.f_needtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "needTimeStr"

LEFT JOIN sys_user AS emp ON a.f_emplid = emp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS checker ON a.f_checkerid = checker.id LEFT JOIN sys_office AS dept ON emp.office_id = dept.id LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS cus ON a.f_custid = cus.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS creater ON a.create_by = creater.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS follower ON a.f_followerid = follower.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ic_sobill( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, f_erpid, f_type, f_billno, f_synstatus, f_syntime, f_custid, f_emplid, f_currencyid, f_needtime, f_status, f_cancellation, f_checkerid, f_checktime, f_checkstatus, f_amount, f_followerid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{erpId}, #{type}, #{billNo}, #{synStatus}, #{synTime}, #{custId}, #{emplId}, #{currencyId}, #{needTime}, #{status}, #{cancellation}, #{checkerId}, #{checkTime}, #{checkStatus}, #{amount}, #{followerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ic_sobill SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, f_erpid = #{erpId}, f_type = #{type}, f_billno = #{billNo}, f_custid = #{custId}, f_emplid = #{emplId}, f_currencyid = #{currencyId}, f_needtime = #{needTime}, f_status = #{status}, f_checkerid = #{checkerId}, f_checktime = #{checkTime}, f_checkstatus = #{checkStatus}, f_amount = #{amount}, f_followerid = #{followerId} WHERE id = #{id}
